name: Get session token to access Sendinblue (SSO)
fullName: Accounts and settings/Reseller/Child accounts#Get session token to access Sendinblue (SSO)
descriptionHtml: It returns a session [token] which will remain valid for a short period of time. A child account will be able to access a white-labeled section by using the following url pattern => https:/email.mydomain.com/login/sso?token=[token]

testStage.descriptionHtml: It returns a session [token] which will remain valid for a short period of time. A child account will be able to access a white-labeled section by using the following url pattern => https:/email.mydomain.com/login/sso?token=[token]
